basics.label: DevOps Engineer
basics.summary: I am a DevOps Engineer with 1 years of experience in the field. I am passionate about technology and I am always looking for new things to learn. I am a hardworking, responsible and enthusiastic person. I am always ready to learn and apply new technologies to my work.

work.summary: Teaching at Palmer Physical Laboratory (now 302 Frist Campus Center). While not a professor at Princeton, I associated with the physics professors and continued to give lectures on campus.
